name: Alan NOVITSKI, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE
name_abbreviation: Novitski v. Commonwealth, Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Alan NOVITSKI, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 31st day of July, 1986, the petition for allowance of appeal is granted, the orders of the Board of Probation and Parole and the Commonwealth Court are vacated, and the case is remanded to the Board for proceedings consistent with this Court’s opinion in Rivenbark v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole, 509 Pa. 248, 501 A.2d 1110 (1985).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Carol F. Munson, Public Defender’s Office, Carlisle, for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
512 A.2d 634
Alan NOVITSKI, Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 31, 1986.
Carol F. Munson, Public Defender’s Office, Carlisle, for petitioner.
